thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chuying Agro-pastoral Group issues 2018 1st tranche super short-term financing notes worth 500 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chuying Agro-pastoral Group issues 2018 1st tranche super short-term financing notes worth 500 mln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - chuying agro-pastoral group co ltd

text:
Feb 12(Reuters) - Chuying Agro-pastoral Group Co Ltd :
* Says it issued 2018 1st tranche super short-term financing notes worth 500 million yuan with a term of 270 days and interest rate of 7.5 percent
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/JSwEQu
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
